nodes.text: Star Wars Insider 98 is the 98th issue of Star Wars Insider, and the 6th issue to be published by Titan Magazines.

The amazing Special Effects secrets are revealed in an exclusive interview with the Star Wars Effects Masters - Phil Tippet [sic], Dennis Muren and Richard Edlund! Get an exclusive insight into future of Star Wars, while Aaron Allston unleashes Fury in the 'Star Wars: Legacy of the Force.' Plus, we take you inside the world of Star Wars collectibles. Available in Newsstand and Previews Exclusive editions."
According to TFAW.com, Insider #97 was originally scheduled to be the "Special Effects" issue; however, that issue was most likely postponed until #98, while #97 is the "Luke & Leia" issue.
